00070     TSV_BINDTO_CIDX  = 1, 
00071     TSV_BINDTO_CNAME = 2, 
00072   };
00073

00076     VALSTATE_INT=1,
00077     VALSTATE_DOUBLE=2,
00078     VALSTATE_STRING=3,
00079   };
00080 
00081   enum tsv_type_t {
00082     TSV_TYPE_UNKNOWN = 0,
00083     TSV_TYPE_ERR     = 1,
00084     TSV_TYPE_STRING  = 2,
00085     TSV_TYPE_INT     = 3,
00086     TSV_TYPE_FLOAT   = 4,
00087     TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE  = 5,
00088   };
00089 
00091   enum tsv_return_t {
00092     TSV_OK                   =  -1, 
00093     TSV_LINE_BLANK           =  -2, 
00094     TSV_LINE_COMMENT         =  -3, 
00095     TSV_ERR_UNKNOWN          = -11, 
00096     TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND         = -12, 
00097     TSV_ERR_NULL             = -13, 
00098     TSV_ERR_CONVERSION       = -14, 
00099     TSV_ERR_FILEIO           = -15, 
00100     TSV_ERR_FORMAT           = -16, 
00101     TSV_ERR_EOF              = -17, 
00102     TSV_HEADER               = -30, 
00103     TSV_HEADER_LAST          = -31, 
00104     TSV_LEVEL_LAST           = -32, 
00105     TSV_FIND_LAST            = -33, 
00106     TSV_LASTVALUE            = -99, 
00107   };
00108 
00110   enum tsv_op_t {
00111     TSV_OP_LT     = 0x01,
00112     TSV_OP_LTEQ   = 0x03,
00113     TSV_OP_EQ     = 0x02,
00114     TSV_OP_GTEQ   = 0x06,
00115     TSV_OP_GT     = 0x04,
00116   };
00117 
00119   enum tsv_indexkind_t {
00120     TSV_INDEX_STRING = 0x1,
00121     TSV_INDEX_INT    = 0x2,
00122     TSV_INDEX_DOUBLE = 0x3,
00123     TSV_INDEX_UINT   = 0x4,
00124     TSV_INDEX_ULONGLONG   = 0x5
00125   };
00127   enum tsv_orderby_t {
00128     TSV_ORDERBY_LINE = 0x01,
00129     TSV_ORDERBY_VAL  = 0x02
00130   };
00132   enum tsv_fileformat_t {
00133     TSV_FORMAT_NONE  = 0x00,
00134     TSV_FORMAT_V1    = 0x01,
00135     TSV_FORMAT_V2    = 0x02,
00136     TSV_FORMAT_TABLE = 0x03,
00137     TSV_FORMAT_BAD   = 0xff
00138   };
00140   enum tsv_bindopt_t {
00141     TSV_BIND_OPTIONAL = 0x01, 
00142     TSV_BIND_WARNING  = 0x02, 
00143     TSV_BIND_REQUIRED = 0x04, 
00144     TSV_BIND_NOFLAG   = 0x00  
00145   };
00147   enum tsv_addflag_t {
00148     TSV_ADD_NONE     = 0x00, 
00149     TSV_ADD_KEYS     = 0x01, 
00150     TSV_ADD_COMMENTS = 0x02, 
00151     TSV_ADD_ALL      = (TSV_ADD_KEYS|TSV_ADD_COMMENTS) 
00152   };
00153
